meanings.definition: Of a color intermediate between green and violet, as of the sky or sea on a sunny day.
meanings.sent1: The sky was so blue and clear today.
meanings.sent2: She painted her room a calming shade of blue.
meanings.sent3: The blue balloon floated higher than the others.
meanings.sent4: His mood turned as blue as the sky before a storm.
meanings.sent5: The blue ocean sparkled under the sun's rays.

meanings.sent1: She used blue to color the ocean in her painting.
meanings.sent2: The artist mixed yellow and blue to create green.
meanings.sent3: The blue stained her fingers after painting all day.
meanings.sent4: The blue of the ocean seemed to blend with the sky.
meanings.sent5: The blue of the dye was vibrant and eye-catching.

meanings.definition: A blue uniform, as of a police officer or soldier.
meanings.sent1: The police officer wore a crisp blue uniform.
meanings.sent2: The soldier proudly donned his blue attire.
meanings.sent3: The blue of the uniform made him easily recognizable.
meanings.sent4: The blue of the police uniform symbolized authority.
meanings.sent5: The blue uniform stood out in the crowd of people.
